subject: Sleep
title: Digital CBT-I Programs
description: A short lesson to help you apply Digital CBT-I Programs.

hook.text: There aren't enough sleep therapists for the billion people with insomnia. An app might be the answer.

buildup.text: Digital CBT-I programs deliver the same techniques as in-person therapy through guided online modules.

discovery.text: Randomized trials show digital CBT-I improves sleep quality nearly as much as face-to-face therapy.

twist.text: The FDA has cleared digital CBT-I as a prescription digital therapeutic, a new category of treatment.

climax.text: Digital delivery makes evidence-based insomnia treatment accessible to millions who can't see a specialist.

punchline.text: The phone that keeps you awake might also teach you to sleep.

quiz.question: How effective is digital CBT-I compared to in-person therapy?
options: It improves sleep quality nearly as much as face-to-face therapy
